ai-patthana15.11:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.11:1.1_0: Because of a trainee, the teaching doesn’t arise because of an adept,
ai-patthana15.11:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.11:2.1_0: Because of an adept’s teaching, the reason for the sake of one without an adept.
ai-patthana15.11:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.11:3.1_0: Not for the sake of insight nor for the sake of streaming clan, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana15.11:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
